name: reg2q1
a1: Match preceding element one or more times
a2: Match preceding element zero or one time
a3: Match preceding element zero or more times

name: reg2q2
a1: Match preceding element one or more times
a2: Match preceding element zero or one time
a3: Match preceding element zero or more times

name: reg2q3
a2: Match a at the beginning of the line

name: reg2q4
a1: Match a at least twice but no more than five times
a2: Match a at least twice but less than five times
a3: Match a at least two times in five different places

name: reg2q5
a2: Match a three or more times
a3: Match a fewer than three times
